identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a culturally rich, emotionally resonant platform for Arangetram planning that blends tradition with modern SaaS efficiency.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Blend 'Royal Heritage' aesthetics with 'Modern SaaS' functionality.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel like a celebration or a reassuring helping hand.
Content is King: The dancer and the art form are the heroes; the UI is the stage.
Zoom In: Focus on the intricate details (jewelry, food textures, fabric folds).
Negative Space: Use generous 'parchment' space to let the content breathe.

headings.usage: Main page titles, section headers, hero text.

primary.name: Deep Crimson (Alta)
primary.usage: Primary brand color, key highlights, active states.

secondary.name: Antique Gold
secondary.usage: Borders, icons, secondary buttons, hover effects.

background.name: Warm Parchment
background.usage: Main page background, card backgrounds (light mode).

surface.name: Pure White
surface.usage: Card surfaces, input fields, modal backgrounds.

spacing_system.philosophy: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 for section padding to create a 'luxury magazine' feel.

marketing.name: The Tetris Grid
marketing.rules: Asymmetric spans. Hero images span 8 cols, text spans 4. Overlap elements using negative margins.

dashboard.name: The Bento Grid
dashboard.rules: Dense, functional. Cards must stretch to fill height (h-full).

textures.noise: Use a subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.02) on the background to simulate paper texture.
textures.mandala: Use large, low-opacity (3%) mandala SVG patterns in the background of 'How it Works' or 'Hero' sections.

hero.alt: Classical Bharatanatyam dancer in a pose

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA standards. Use #0F4C5C (Teal) for text on light backgrounds instead of pure gold.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings using the secondary gold color (#C5A059).
accessibility.reduced_motion: Respect prefers-reduced-motion for parallax and scroll animations.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a platform that feels like a 'Digital Concierge' for a high-stakes cultural event. It must feel expensive but accessible.
do_not: DO NOT use default Shadcn 'slate' colors. Override them with the Warm Parchment and Deep Crimson palette.
DO NOT use generic 'Inter' font for headings. Load 'Playfair Display' from Google Fonts.
DO NOT make the AI chat look like a generic chatbot. Give it a personality (e.g., 'Event Assistant') and a distinct visual container.
do: DO use the 'Tetris Grid' for the landing page to showcase the imagery.
DO use the 'Bento Grid' for the vendor selection dashboard.
DO implement the 'Gold Shimmer' effect on primary buttons on hover.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
